comment: Did his experimental theater leadership class. He is so passionate and so caring. I took the class to do something way out of my comfort zone, and it was definitely different, but he did a good job of making a no-judgement zone. There is technically a book but I never read it.

Prof. Long did an experimental discovery for the Honors college in which we got to really step out of our comfort zones and discover new things about ourselves. Prof. Long helped me step out of my comfort zone and trust other people. He made me confront myself and face my actions. He was an amazing professor! 10/10 recommend for theatre as well!
CAN HE PLEASE TEACH ALL OF THE THEATER CLASSES AT KSU? - He is what I call, a professor. He teaches with passion and cares about every student and their progress. I had him for Acting 2. :)

WONDERFUL TEACHER! His passion for teaching could be seen in every moment of the class. His relation of the material to the students was crystal clear. He wants the best for his students. Unless you are willing to do the work though, you shouldn't take him. He expects you to truly take his class seriously.

For anyone aspiring to work professionally as an actor/ director, this is the class to take. I have taken both Acting I and Acting II with him, and his class has been the most beneficial. Attendance is mandatory, but he pushes his students to always find new discoveries, do their best and never settle. He is truly the best acting teacher I've had.

Harrison's the MAN! He'll definitely put you through the ringer, but it's all for your own benefit as an actor. I deeply appreciate the amount of work and energy he puts into teaching acting. It's insane how much you will grow as a performer (and a person) throughout the semester. TAKE HIM!

I Finally Learned about Acting taking his Course. Pretty intense but still beneficial. However Grades hard on Critiques & will pair you with classmates for scenes that either scheduling rehearsal conflicts or as not serious about acting. I love Mr. Long but can be ego driven at times.
One of the best experiences of my life. I owe so much to this brilliant man and his teaching. There is no one that I respect more.
Amazing professor, extremely knowledgeable, fun to be in class with and REALLY teaches you something!
Greatest Teacher to ever walk the face of this planet. Period.
h-lo is awesome.  could be the next peter gallagher.

Well, going into this class I assumed I'd hate it, but I find myself constantly laughing at Mr. Long's absolute insanity. He's always jumping around, screaming, making lame jokes, and just generally acting up on stage while he and Mrs. Robinson teach class. I enjoy it because the class itself is lame. He adds some spunk.
